text: You won't be able to grab what's infront of you if you won't let go what's behind you!
author: Unknown

text: Untill the lion learns how to write, the story will glorify only the hunter
author: Marmik Soni

text: It doesn't metter if you get knocked down, It matters whether you decide to stand up of give up!
author: Vince Lombardi

text: The same boiling water that hardens the eggs also softens the potatos
author: Marmik Soni

text: You grow through from what you go through!
author: Krisha Soni
